basics.name: Ian Pratt
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Just a person who likes to learn and code, and learn to code new things.

work.name: Windy City Lab
work.summary: Interned at the WCL as a digital electronics programmer, working on some projects.
highlights: Developed a Particle library to use the Chip23LCV1024 SPI EEPROM to store microcode for the NAND7400.
Worked on the Loop Tracks project, and made the server and iOS app (and a couple other things too).
Worked on the Mayo EHealth project, building a Swift library to automatically download and load CoreML models from the Mayo Clinic.

education.institution: Albert G Lane Technical High School
education.area: General Education with a specialty in Computer Science

awards.title: HackVH BattleSnake Competition - 2nd Place
awards.summary: 2nd Place at the HackVH BattleSnake Competition, with my (now deleted) snake, 'quasnek'.
